mapper.insert: insert into jado_chat(chatNum,content,chatDate,memNum,thmNum,chatType) values('C'||to_char(lpad(seq_cht.nextval, 9, '0')),#{content},sysdate, (select memNum from jado_member where userNum = #{userNum} and proNum = #{proNum}), #{thmNum}, #{chatType})
insert into scrap(title, content, startDate, userNum) values(#{title},#{content},sysdate,#{themeName})
mapper.select: select title from scrap where userNum = #{userNum}
select content from scrap where userNum = #{themeName} and title = #{title}
mapper.update: update scrap set content =#{content}, startDate = sysdate where userNum = #{themeName} and title = #{title}
mapper.select: select * from jado_msg where receiver = #{receiver} order by startDate desc
mapper.delete: delete jado_msg where receiver = #{receiver} and substr(content,1,10) = #{proNum}
